* Please Note: No Additional Interest Rate for Senior Citizens
# 1. Minimum Tenure for NRE Deposit is 1 year
# 2. In case of pre-closure within 1 year no interest shall be paid and no penalty would be levied
# 3. In case of part withdrawal within 1 year no interest shall be paid on the amount partially withdrawn and no penalty would be levied
Up to 5 lakhs :: Amount :: Interest Rate (pa) : 4%
> 5 lakhs to 50 lakhs :: Amount :: Interest Rate (pa) : 5.50%
> 50 lakhs to 5 crores :: Amount :: Interest Rate (pa) : 6.75%
> 5 crores :: Amount :: Interest Rate (pa) : 7%
* Important Points: No Additional Interest Rate for Senior Citizens
# 1. Revised rates are applicable to deposits below Rs. 2 Crore only.
# 2. The Bonafide staff/employees of Ujjivan Small Finance Bank Limited are eligible for an additional rate of 1% over and above the rates mentioned.
# 3. Staff will not be eligible for Senior Citizen rates.
